name: Tokyo Detectives: Case 03
description: Case 03 Complete : Blood on Sailor Uniform

name: PixelGround: Expansion Pack
description: Additional characters Noel, Rakum, Kyosun, Noah, and Rogen are available.

name: Gunner
description: Help the gunner destroy the enemy castle. By placing the right platforms in the right place, you can direct the cannonball to the desired position. Just set the cannon and fire!

name: DIY Tour: Indie Rock Simulator
description: Make a band, tour Canada, get famous? A resource management music tycoon/simulation game. Manage your band, make choices in random events, play concerts, and build your reputation.

name: Flower Knight Hu Die
description: A hybrid visual novel-RPG where you take on the role of Hú Dié, one of the city's (unwilling) resident magical girls as she looks for the truth behind her best friend's disappearance. A sapphic magical girl romance set in the solarpunk city of Yánghuāchéng!

name: Lost In Space: The Adventure Game
description: "Danger! Danger!" Play as Will Robinson, Dr. Smith and Robot in this 3D, point & click adventure game based on the TV show: Lost in Space. Explore treacherous environments, outwit classic Villains and solve countless puzzles and mysteries to rescue your fellow crew members of the Jupiter 2.

name: Slide 'Em Up
description: A cute puzzle game where you slide along a grid, assassinating guards to get to the exit!

name: Star Melody: Yumemi Dreamer - Chapter 5
description: This is the fifth chapter of Kugado Studio's famed "Kuroneko-san Team", their first completely new game in ten years!

name: Furry Tower Defense
description: In a deadly world full of Horde monsters, you and a brigade of weaponized furries must find your way to the land of the Hull through Tower Defense style gameplay, doing everything you can to stop the Horde from destroying your Crystal- then you.

name: Runes Magica
description: Runes Magica is 2D rogue-like magic action game. Use a variety of magic and artifacts to defeat your enemies and end your revenge.

name: The Highlands
description: A top down-multiplayer-arena-brawler where you collect resources and craft your weapons of choice all while trying to stay alive and become the ultimate brawler in this fast paced game.

name: Deicider
description: Win back your freedom through gladiatorial combat and discover the secrets of the arena and its creator. Arm yourself with the strongest equipment you can find and face this crooked, 2D, roguelike, dungeon crawler.

name: The Legend of Gandar
description: The Legend of Gandar is an action-adventure video game. The player slips into the legend of Gandar, in the role of the farm boy. He woke up one day and received a strange letter, and so begins the story of a boy.

name: Luminera: The Radiant Journey
description: Roll the Dice to decide your fate in this Turn Based, Point and Click RPG!

name: The Fantasy World of Mahjong Princess
description: This is a 2D Japanese Mahjong game with adult simulation features. You are a big Mahjong fan who got reincarnated in another world. As the world‘s top Mahjong tutor, you need to build your own team and train your students while developing special relationships with them.

name: Backrooms: Levels of Fear
description: If you're not careful and no-clip out of reality in wrong areas, you'll end up in the Backrooms, where it's nothing but the stink of moist carpet, the madness of mono-yellow, and endless background noise of fluorescent lights at maximum hum-buzz...

name: Terminal Insanity: RackJacker
description: There’s an imminent threat of nuclear annihilation from the two of the world’s greatest powers, and the protagonist, a female Japanese hacker, has to prevent it from happening while seeking justice for the death of her family.

name: The Ancient Cat Temple
description: This is a little Metroidvania where you control a cute archeologist cat trying to find the secrets of an ancient civilization. Explore, solve puzzles and be careful, the brightest path is not always the safest.

name: Ethereal Rift
description: Ethereal Rift is a procedurally generated ARPG based around crafting builds, gathering items and hack and slash combat. Play with up to 4 players in this dark fantasy adventure, slaying huge creatures and dark spirits to bring peace to the middle worlds.

name: Maroon Berets: 2030
description: Maroon Berets: 2030 is FPS, TPS, Action-RPG; which simulates the units of special forces in the war.

name: Kapellmeister
description: Run. Hide. Follow the orders. Keep quiet. Solve puzzles. Don't forget to check the cameras; someone is stalking you. And if you are lucky, maybe you'll get out of this loop of never-ending and repeating events.

name: SweetHex: Celestial Encounters
description: Styled after classic point-and-click adventure games of yore, SweetHex aims to deliver a charming and wholesome adventure which features a unique 2.5D style comic panel style storytelling along with a familiar Visual Novel style narrative.

name: Peep Invasion
description: Forge your team from a variety of different creatures, each with their own strengths and abilities, and stop the never-ending invasion of Peeps!

name: Gales of Nayeli
description: Face an impending darkness threatening the world of Iuven alongside Nayeli and an interesting cast of warriors. Control varied battlefields in Grid-Based Strategy RPG format while interweaving character relationships to the main conflict.

name: Harddrive
description: Harddrive is a run 'n' gun shooter set in a strange universe. You will fight armies of books and pencils that threaten your home electronic world.

name: Neon Ronin
description: Neon Ronin is a rogue-lite tactical RPG set in a stylish cyberpunk world. Combine unique attacks and abilities with powerful augments to conquer ever-changing encounters. Customize your party's stats and talents as they level up to craft a strategy and squad strong enough to survive the neon city.

name: Inferno Arena
description: Prepare for intense 5v5 FPS action. Inferno Arena is a 3-freedoms-of-movement multiplayer First Person Arena Shooter in ultra-low-latency 1,000 ticks-per-second glory.

name: Shuriken
description: This is a computer RPG game. In the game, players are responsible for playing roles, moving and surviving in a world full of monsters.

name: DzombZ
description: Survive or die ! Experience survival horror full of puzzles while escaping between the streets of Algeria after zombies invasion . Suffer to protect your life in situations never attempt them before with first person perspective and powerful actions that make it more realistic then ever

name: Battle Shooter
description: This is a First-person shooter game. Unique Modified weapons system to create the player's unique gun, conquer every enemy. The combination of the next generation of gameplay, diversified map and mode selection, leading players to the volatile battlefield, enjoy different game fun.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Top Class DD
description: This DLC includes the Top Class DD. A luxury double-decker bus for Fernbus Coach Simulator

name: Eldertrail
description: Eldertrail is a turn-based strategy with rpg elements and adventure cards based exploration. You will take control of unique heroes, explore the world, build up your town, fight tactical battles, craft legendary weapons, level up and evolve your units and heroes to take out your opponents.

name: Empty War
description: "You're the best warrior in your planet. Now your race want to conquert everything, and you're the only one to stop them."

name: Six Aspects
description: Six Aspects may be the first Same Time Strategy (STS) game melding the tactical nature of turn based systems with the challenging demand of real time strategy.

name: Just Upstream
description: Help Paul on his journey to find self worth as he jumps, climbs, and swings through mystic nature in this Physics-based VR platformer.

name: Studio Apart(ment)
description: You just moved to a new city. The rooms are small, the people aren't very nice, and there's nothing to do. Is there? Play through 7 days of a life sim and then do it again. After each run, buy upgrades and unlock new areas. Explore a new procedurally generated city every reset.

name: Bloody Forest
description: Bloody Forest is an online co-op survival horror game for 1-5 players. You got lost in the forest and you are looking for potential inhabitants or something to repair your car. But what you don't know is that a monster lives here.

name: Nightmare Party
description: Nightmare Party is a 5 player co-op multiplayer horror FPS. You are trapped demon hunters and your goal is to survive and escape while a demon and its minions try to kill you.

name: Raid Off!
description: Boss rush with your raiders in this MMO simulator. Adapt your stategy in this Real Time Strategy with pauses. If bosses are hard, wait to see when you will share a legendary loot among your raiders.

name: Chapel 3-D: The Ascent
description: Chapel 3-D: The Ascent is a break-neck, violent boomer shooter inspired by classics of the genre. Experience the story behind the events of Cathedral 3-D and make your enemies regret ever crossing your path. Become a beast and let loose.

name: SeaDogs of Nassau
description: Nassau lies in ruins. Its people look to you to restore it to its former glory. Will you loot, plunder, and decimate all who stand in your way as a pirate? Or will you use your strength and charisma to rise through the ranks of the Navy? Choose your path in this dynamic sandbox adventure.

name: Groove Fit Island!!
description: Rhythm x Fitness x VR! Let's get fit while having fun to the music with the unique animals!

name: Hinter
description: Hinter is a horror game based on a brutal piece of disturbing crime case in Bavaria Germany

name: Dreg Cannon
description: Rise up and help save New Vega from the Techno-mages!

name: Pogan
description: Embark on a journey to bring peace to Wyraj in this Slavic mythology-inspired adventure. Explore endless, generated lands as you strive for victory over powerful gods and demons. Alone or with friends, embrace the unknown yet to come.

name: Penguin Slide
description: Penguin Slide is a fast paced, physics based, singleplayer obstacle course game with a focus on being fun.

name: Baller Blast
description: A new twist on the classic brick-breaker!

name: Crawling Silence
description: Uncover the mysteries of an old, long forgotten building with a dark past, or choose to try and escape the creatures lurking within it with friends! Crawling Silence features two main modes, a story mode and an online co-op mode.

name: Remains of Morrow
description: An atmospheric third person game about a wizard's final quest. The game tells the story of the victories and failures of a wizard who was once considered the best. Now in the twilight years of his life he’s asked by a stranger for a favor. Take control of the wizard and complete his final mission.

name: SpellTome
description: SpellTome is a story driven fantasy adventure 2D platformer. Hurl balls of magic, dash across levels, and jump over obstacles while trying to get the fabled SpellTome.

name: Boooost!!!!
description: Boooost!!!! is a skill-based, sci-fi themed action platformer with some narrative driven elements and some minor puzzle elements.

name: Mana Launcher
description: Embark on an epic MMO multiverse adventure in a totally free RPG game, and become a legend which will be remembered across generations, universes, be memorable in whole worlds. Feel the mana power growing on you!

name: Looping Bravery
description: Looping Bravery is a sci-fi deckbuilding roguelike card battler. Try to find a way to save the planet from an impending alien invasion by traveling back in time to stop an event knows as "The Marking" from happening. Fight in the past to save the future.

name: Astro Adventures: And the Portals of Madness
description: Astro Adventures: And the Portals of Madness is a platform game with puzzles where you control Astro, an Astronaut who is on a lunar base whose mission is to research teleportation. After a big accident millions of portals start to appear. Now he has to find a way to escape.

name: Raise Your Tribe
description: RAISE YOU TRIBE and fight against Robots or other Survivors. Explore, Craft, Build and Survive in a deadly post-nuclear war island where artificial intelligence has defeated humanity. Start from scratch and end up as the leader of Island!

name: GG-Party
description: GG-Party is a party-game for up to 8 player. Grab your friends, choose your favourite colour, and get ready to defend it with all your power!

name: Eftu
description: In a world threatened by a mysterious interdimensional entity, pick your guild, pick your ship, and pick your battles! Compete with other guilds for resources in a variety of game modes, including Team Versus, Battle Royale, and Racing!

name: Rover Operator
description: Various space rovers operate on hostile distant planets. They surmount all sorts of difficult obstacles, sheer walls, lava, gravity traps, lasers etc. to explore alien worlds, to gather resources and help humans in places where they couldn’t survive. It’s a game of skill, wariness and dexterity.

name: Bones and Magic
description: Bones and Magic is a tower defense game in which the player uses towers and traps to stop enemies. Use your magic wand and build various traps and towers to eliminate all enemies. Collect crystals from enemies and buy upgrades for your traps.

name: Steel Deal
description: Play as an unnamed guy and solve the mystery of an old mansion while being haunted by a welder. Discover an epic journey through many exciting and hard levels!

name: The Forked Road
description: The Forked Road is a story about traveling through a dead world in search of a place to call home. Which path will you choose, and can you not lose yourself?

name: Minotaur Princess
description: Rescue the Princess? You are the princess! Defeat the minotaur? You ARE the minotaur! Embark on the journey of a princess who gets body swapped with a minotaur. A puzzle fighter RPG where your wits and cunning will be put to the test in a combination of turn based and real-time gameplay.

name: Jasper Vice: Legends Untold
description: Soar, dive, and explore the floating islands as a young Gryphon in this flying fantasy adventure. Delve into the lore and discover what it means to be a Voyager.

name: Funerary Services Marquez Paz
description: Enter the rough streets of Marquez Paz, Argentina. Explore the neighborhood and meet its peculiar inhabitants, work for "the fune" and get some cash, cave the head in of a couple of idiots and get some more cash. Get used to it, because the things you're going to see... Oh... Good heavens!...

name: Everburning
description: A dormant secret lay beneath the ruins of a forgotten world. A Goddess, unravelling from the rumbles of a temple, entrusts you with a mission: to build a female-only guild. Can you, noble warrior, fulfil her request?

name: Topspin
description: Jump and dash your way to victory in this vibrant side-scrolling platformer. Navigate through stunning environments and intricate puzzles on your quest to punch powerful enemies and save your kingdom.

name: DragonScales 7: A Heart of Dark Flames
description: The ultimate DragonScales experience. Tile-matching puzzles, battles and a journey of revenge and redemption.

name: SGS Pacific D-Day
description: One game, five great battles where the US Marines gained even more glory, at the price of terrible losses. Relive bloody assaults on Saipan, Tinian, Tarawa, Iwo Jima and Peleliu in this recreation of epic land battles of the Pacific War. Both sides are playable, each with their own challenge

name: Gate Builders
description: Gate Builders is a sci-fi turn-based 4X strategy game. Build space stations, manage work force, exploit, trade and transform resources. Face space pirates and enemy factions. Build, Expand, Thrive!

name: Nebula
description: A single-player starship colony simulation game with RPG elements, set in a vast galaxy waiting to be explored!

name: ReEstate
description: A real estate investment and business simulator, with aspects of life simulator who puts you in the skin of someone who just lost everything including your parents and needs to win in life.

name: Shibainu: VR Katana Simulator
description: ShibaInu is a virtual reality (VR) Katana simulator. This game mainly focuses on proper Katana handling, physics interactions and cutting mechanics. Precise and controlled cuts are performed on Tatamis (traditional Japanese floor mat) rolled into a cylindrical shape.

name: Dickdown Duel
description: Dickdown Duel is an erotic card game RPG about a card game that got lewd cards modded into it. Acquire new cards, build decks, challenge cute girls and dominate them in Lewd card based duels.

name: Tyrant Quest: Gold Edition
description: Tyrant Quest is an erotic, dark fantasy visual novel about a Dark Lord who seeks revenge after being sealed away for a hundred years. And so he sets out with his last loyal subject, the succubus Lili, seeking a way to regain his power!

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator: Submarines
description: Ship Graveyard Simulator: Submarines brings a new and exciting addition to the game we know and love. Have you already disassembled all the ships on the sandy beach? Then now it’s time to put your skills to test with submarines!

name: Shatterspace
description: Super-tight controls and satisfying mechanics will guide you from the seemingly-peaceful early levels all the way to complete insanity in this survival space adventure. Beginner pilots will grow, skilled pilots will be challenged, but only the best will reach the end.

name: Words
description: A slow-paced, story-driven, first-person game that offers an abstract and surrealistic exploration of a troubled mind in its journey towards acceptance.

name: Stranger Danger or Horror, Quest and Magic
description: Stranger Danger or Horror, Quest and Magic is a Survival Horror game where you, as the protagonist, must escape from a mad clown who appears in random stages of his anger. The killer clown is a psychopath. He is a unique type of enemy. He likes to play with the protagonist before dealing with her.

name: Match 3 Fantasy
description: A love-letter to classic turn-based RPGs with match 3 puzzle combat and point-&-click gameplay. Travel the globe, battle enemies, and save the world!

name: The Lost Weld
description: The Lost Weld is an exciting, fantasy-themed action-adventure game being made by an all-female development team. The game features a compelling, movie-like script recorded by some of the industry’s top voice-acting talents, beautiful open world environments, and engaging game action.

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Gods' Margarita
description: Βecome the latest hope of humanity! Embody the psyche of Reniat Noc and explore the post-apocalyptic lands of AI Legave. Customize your character with futuristic gadgets, solve real-life puzzles, discover the history that led to your present, and bring life into the future.

name: Nirmita
description: Nirmita is a fabulous world full of mysteries, laughter and sudden discoveries! The tough task of survival here will be brightened up by hilarious creatures, adorable NPCs, many builds, crafting and home improvements, as well as an intriguing story of finding the main villain with several endings!

description: Solve 300 jigsaw puzzles of Wonderful Nature, Amazing Animals and Greatest Cities. Choose puzzles from 30 to 600 pieces and play solo or together up to 4 players!

name: Zombies Around Us
description: Zombies Around Us - tower defense style game. Defend the tower from zombies and earn coins, use coins to upgrade weapons.

name: GT Manager
description:
Manage your team from the pit wall to learn and master the art of racing.
Scout sponsors and drivers, invest in your factory to research and build performance parts.

Score championship points and climb rankings to move up Leagues.
No driving skills are required, instruct your drivers from the pit!

Collect official Porsche, Mercedes, McLaren, Nissan, Audi, Corvette and other manufacturer cars, earn championship points to progress through the leagues, improve the performance of your cars, the statistics of your drivers and many more.

Race on 16 different tracks in Sprint, Endurance, Daily and Seasonal races, adapt your strategy to tracks and racing days conditions.

Ready to manage your team? Download GT Manager now!

name: Path of Becoming
description: Path of Pecoming is a quest adventure in which you have to travel to the mysterious world of the magical Grimoire!

name: Monster
description: The princess is gorgeous, out of this world. However, reality is often hidden behind what we see. The princess has a slave named MC and she is often seen torturing him. Visiting the royal library recently, MC stumbled upon a magical book. So, how will MC take advantage of the book, let’s find out.

name: Twilight Monk
description: Explore the shattered world of Speria as the last remnant of ancient Kung Fu warriors in Twilight Monk! Destroy demons, or enslave them as you hunt down and obliterate the portals from whence they came. In Twilight Monk, you will explore Metroidvania dungeons connected by an open world.

name: Press A For Achievements
description: Press, mash and hold A to earn achievements, level-up, collect coins and prove your awesomeness on the worldwide leaderboard. Probably the most fun you can have with one hand.

name: BroBlast
description: BROBLAST is a top down builder game where you defend your base from enemies

name: SonderDo
description: You have to survive the night until 08:00/8 AM. The only thing you have by your side is your flashlight. This game is a mix of Co-op, multiplayer, and strategy. It is especially hard to maneuver around the school since the teachers can hear you inside of an area.

name: Lilium
description: Lilium is an action role-playing game taking place in a very small, but dense open world. It has a short, interesting main story, several side quests, dungeons and exciting secrets waiting to be discovered. Find your fun by interacting with your surroundings, develop your character, loot everything.

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws: Pack - Variety Pack XS
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Doom & Destiny Worlds: Iron Nerds
description: Only one chance, only for the bravest. You cannot continue in case of defeat.

name: Dark Sheep: Master Chapter
description: Want more challenge? Then you'll love Master Chapter for Dark Sheep! The Master chapter combines the unique puzzle elements of the original game and the free content update Aftermath into 30 challenging but fair levels that will test your wits.

name: Block Kuzushi
description: It is a retro 3D block breakout that you can easily play. All operations are possible with only the mouse, and the ball behaves by physics.

name: Sarrisa and the Legendary Sword
description: Sarissa and the Legendary Sword is a Brazilian turn-based RPG, with a simple and beautiful story. In it, you will follow friends, Sarissa, Dandara, Elaine and Patricia, as they go on an adventurous journey, where love and friendship, and a fated destiny will change their lives forever.

name: Conquest
description: Go from alone in the forest, to leading your army to victory! Choose your weapons and level up to unlock new skills, kill enemies to earn loot and gold, and construct a village to raise an army. The open world is full of enemies and villages, all of which are ready for combat.

name: Tilt
description: Tilt is an action-racing game with expressive three-button controls and shortcut incentivizing topdown maps. Upgrade your modules and expand your moveset. Escape time-traveling explosions through different solar systems.

name: Soaring
description: Climb upwards and uncover the mystery of your lost egg in this unique platformer. Along the way you will find hidden treasures, brave devious traps and hopefully keep solid footing, its a long way from the top !

name: Orbit or Beat: Extended Edition
description: Get ready for new type of rhythm action game you may have never experienced before. Listen to various awesome music, control your ball, and dodge all the obstacles to get through all the levels. But be prepared to any unexpected and "unfair" gimmicks designed throughout the levels.

name: Return of the Video Dead: Demon in the Shell
description: A Haunted Arcade, collect coins to play games to avoid getting haunted by the Demon that haunts this place. Shadows will scare you, voices will make you jump, avoid the ghost´s that roam this place by hiding. Will you be able to get a highscore?

name: Cursed Dungeon Raider
description: An exploration adventure with spooky and horror elements, where you have to recover real historic artifacts from excavation sites all over the world. Watch out for local traps and monsters based on the mythology of the respective region.

name: Rabbit's Tale
description: The tale of a Rabbit that goes in search of his family after they were kidnapped by a sovereign entity that has an oppressive dominion over his world. But, along the way, something very mystical and dark happens to our hero.

name: Car Mechanic Manager 2023
description: Car Mechanic Manager is a tycoon management game that lets you manage your own car mechanic business! Build, expand and modernize your car workshop to maintain a good reputation and attract more customers. Manage your business efficiently and destroy the competition!

name: Hall Infinite
description: Hall Infinite is a challenging infinite runner with multiple varied environments and several playable characters! You will require precise timing and deliberate movements in order to achieve a high score.

name: Crusader: Dungeon Series
description: Crusader: Dungeon Series Dungeon of Dagginor is the first in the series and is a simple dungeon crawler.

name: This Next Time
description: This Next Time is a sci-fi strategy game.

name: Find the Gnome 2
description: Help find these adorable gnome creatures. Is it behind the tree? Is it in the bushes? Look, what shuffles over there? ]Features hand modeled stylized low poly lush 3D environments with as much interaction as possible, supported by atmospheric music. And comics! Its all about the feel.

name: The Busker
description: A metroidvania 2D platformer where you explore a dystopian urban landscape. Smash your enemies with your trusted guitar! Unlock new abilities and weapons. Meet friends and make choices that will affect the future of this city.

name: Lighthaze World
description: Discover a charming adventure in Lighthaze World, a cozy puzzle game for adventure lovers. Collect treasure, solve nonlinear puzzles and follow the anxious hero's heartfelt journey to save their loyal dog. Your decisions shape this delightful puzzle experience.

name: Meridiana: A demon's madness
description: You take on the role of Meridiana, a demon summoned to a high-fantasy world, and interact with others through her. As you travel the world, will your demonic nature take over, or will you learn from others how to be a good person?

name: Battle Support
description: This is a 2d war game where players can use the support in the column below to support ground troops. Players can obtain various parts to upgrade their army by completing a game, making the army stronger and winning!

name: Imbalance
description: A fast-paced roguelike shooter with a strong focus on deckbuilding and talent synergies.It fuzes together the dynamic of Doom and thoughtful gameplay and tons of replayability of Slay the Spire.

name: Perish Song
description: Perish Song is a 2D action rogue-lite. Traverse through different environments as you battle unique enemies and bosses. Discover the secrets of the world as you dash and blast through anything standing in your path. Each death is an opportunity to learn, adapt, and overcome.

name: My Dragon Party
description: Every few hundred years a group of friends gathers for a party where they eat, play games, share their stories, drink and have fun. What interesting stories can they tell us this time? Let's find out!

name: Leviathan: Streams of Legends
description: Command your army (composed of your Twitch viewers) in this new legendary Social Real Time Strategy game. Bond with your audience in unprecedented ways where you control the war, while they fight each battle from their phones.

name: Terrovox
description: Explore a huge world. You can go in any direction. Get resources. Craft weapons and items. Create buildings. Use your imagination to the maximum.

name: Heart Abyss
description: In a world where there is an eternal war between the unions of the human race and beastmen, accidental deaths and slave trade are not rare. But what happens if two slaves by chance unite and survive together, being wanted? Leon and Ray are one of those.

name: One Life
description: One hit death bullet hell action featuring upgrades, unlockable abilities, minigames, hats and you.

name: Frisson
description: Frisson is a top-down single-player game that places you in the seat of a sadistic game-maker that forces people in an arena to make them fight to the death until only one person remains. Watch as they interact with the world and forms strategies to survive.

name: Dungeon Run
description: I wanted to see how much RPG elements can I add into a running platform game. Lol It looks like quiet a lot. The game has randomized map generation. Player is equipped with a sword and magic to devastate monsters. Level up your skills using XP and coins. All this while you never stop running!

name: SoulShards Arena
description: SoulShards Arena is an upcoming multiplayer game inspired by MMORPGs PvP modes. In teams of 3 players, defeat your opponents through powerful spells. But beware, as the Winds of Magic can be capricious ...

name: Balance Knight
description: Balance Knight is a game in which the player must advance up a scaffolding shaken by physics.

name: Squamations
description: Squamations is a relaxing yet fast paced word game you can play at your own speed!

name: Even Heroes Die
description: Race to find the cure to your mortal illness in this roguelike Metroidvania hybrid.

name: The Castle of Time
description: This is a fighting platformer with a dynamic combat system where you have to fight enemies with your sword.

name: House of Weirdos
description: a parody of cheap indie horror games.

name: Relicborn
description: Relicborn is a story-driven platformer game that tells the story of Alice, a young dressmaker who finds herself in an undiscovered world, searching for a distant, long lost possibility. ARPG elements, fantasy environments, legendary loot, a skill system along with many secrets to be discovered!

name: Unsleepable
description: "Unsleepable" is a 3D horror game with a suspense story. The main character -- Mike Sorris ,had to find out the truth in this village, and leave the village.

name: Top Town
description: Top Town is an upcoming life simulation game. Create a character and define your own goals and identity by choosing a profession and hobbies. Buy your dream house, visit stores and explore in a persistent and reactive world.

name: Worm Slayer
description: Worm Slayer is a Fast-Paced Bullet Hell Roguelike where you must fight your way through the dungeon that is the Worm King's den to finally reach and then defeat the Worm King.

name: Venice Master
description: Become a craftsman in the Renaissance Venice. Develop business after business, be resourceful and creative. Many tasks can be completed only if you construct the most suitable machines first. No need to give it any more thought, just roll up your sleeves and get to work!

name: It Came From Within
description: Something crawled up the kitchen sink drain. Now it is your responsibility. Make choices that will affect its growth in this short disturbing first-person psychological horror walking simulator.

name: The hardest game in the universe 2
description: The sequel to the most impossible game. The new 2D adventure, embark on this platform game that will test your skill of how much patience you are capable of,New mechanic, 10,000 kills, if you lose your game will be erased, What is the way to make a sequel to an extremely difficult game???

name: Hunyadi Strategy
description: Hunyadi is a hexagonal strategy game based on a historical character John Hunyadi from the 15th Century. He was one of the greatest military mind of his age. He lead military campaigns mostly against the rising Ottoman empire.

name: Super Hamster Havoc
description: Super Hamster Havoc is a twin-stick arena shooter about a war between hamsters and rats.

name: Remote Life 2: Fearless
description: "Remote Life 2" is a sci-fi an action packed platformer. Combat against scary aliens and escape from the monster Hive. After the success of the first "Remote Life", now you can enjoy even more of the crazy weapons, cool vehicles and outstanding and unique art of Mario Malagrino.

name: The Forgotten Demons
description: The Forgotten Demons is a 2D, top-down, dungeon crawler, packed with fierce enemies, powerful spells, multiple unique weapons and more.

name: Welcome to the Backrooms
description: There must be an exit somewhere. Keep your wits about you as you traverse a seemingly endless labyrinth of dingy yellow walls and moldy carpet. Find candy bars and almond water to keep your strength, and stay out of the shadows to keep your sanity.

name: Give the People What They Want
description: A VR Game where you take on odd jobs, become your ideal self, and throw things at customers' faces.

name: Potatoes
description: Potatoes is a puzzle/platformer game in which you control multiple characters by recording what should they do. Make potatoes collaborate to reach the objective in 50 different levels of increasing difficulty!

name: Magirune 2
description: While mining in the search of water, an artifact is found. Learn the secret of this world in this casual dungeon crawler.

name: Raven
description: Go to your happy place with Raven: A relaxing, trick-taking card game. Embrace the serene atmosphere while trumping your AI opponents. Win the bid, choose trumps and play cards to win points for your team.

name: Necore Warriors
description: Necore Warriors is a short turn-based strategy game, battle through ten strategic levels and discover the story behind the realm's greatest war!

name: Vedette
description: You are the head of an experimental anti-crime task force in the city of Osteria. Use search history, recent emails, and criminal backgrounds to determine whether an individual is likely to commit a crime. The choices you make will have a significant impact on the entire city’s future.

name: Astrolander
description: Astrolander is a fast-paced twist-filled local co-op game inspired by Lunar Lander! 2 players control 1 rocket: Use thrusters, rotation, & special abilities to solve puzzles, whiz around obstacles, & dodge enemies. Test your skills & your friendships!

name: Fynite
description: Welcome to Fynite, a backrooms horror / thriller game. You've noclipped into the backrooms getting out isn't likely, do you have what it takes?

name: Adamstown
description: Adamstown is a casual, strategy and puzzle, city builder. Create endless towns full of cars and people. Explore new puzzle types and unlock more challenging modes.

name: Jumbo: Jewel of Realms
description: Welcome to Jumbo: Jewel of Realms, an action-platformer adventure! Embark on a quest from Bloom Town that would take you against countless of formidable foes – interact with a variety of unique characters with their own stories and discover the secrets of the Jewel of Realms.

name: Lulu Way
description: Lulu the little astronaut is trapped in space. Help Lulu escape eternal limbo by jumping from one block to another, solving uniquely crafted puzzles is the only way!

name: Contrablade World
description: Speed through a vast open world and experience incredible battles while you advance your Contrablade in a quest to challenge and beat the mythical gods. A brand new adventure RPG in the unique action physics fighting franchise Contrablade.

name: Raccoon Crafts Factory
description: Raccoon Crafts Factory is a game about creating automated factories to produce things of increasing complexity, within an endless 2D world - Use your imagination to design factories, combine simple elements into complex structures.

name: Stone Mirth on Earth
description: Stone Mirth on Earth is a comedy fantasy point and click adventure in which you will take on the role of Stone Mirth, the volcanic stone from Mars who has to save the earth from an evil stone in order to return to his home planet and prove himself a hero.

name: Magical Harvest
description: In this 3D-fantasy farming game you are the one who wants to save the world of Hyldena from the loss of all magic. While exploring Hyldena, you will be able to evolve plants and animals into magical variations and even learn how to use magic yourself with alchemy.

name: Just Power: The Papal States
description: Are you ready to found a dynasty which controls the Holy See over the centuries? Climb the hierarchies, hire your relatives, blackmail and bribe to get everything you want in this turn-based political simulator.

name: Aledorn
description: Spiritual successor to many old school hard-core RPG/Dungeon masterpieces, that combines tactical combat system, exploration in the first person view and intriguing travelling system between main map locations.

name: Dumb Little Robots
description: Dumb Little Robots is a 2d puzzle game where you control robots that each have a single function. Help them work together to solve tricky levels. Meet new robots as you go and learn how they change the possibilities!

name: Rocco's Inferno
description: Rocco's Inferno is a top down, narrative role playing game inspired by The Sopranos and the crime films of Martin Scorsese. You play through a day in the life of Rocco Dante, a captain in the Reggiani crime Family. Who will still be living by tomorrow, is up to you.

name: Lil Splody: Look Out Below!
description: Zodac and his minions are wreaking havoc! It's up to you to dodge and blow up falling enemies in an attempt to rescue your fellow bomblings!

name: Pack My Stuff
description: Pack My Stuff is as simple as that. As an employee of a moving company, help residents in Neuberg move and pack your possessions into moving boxes.

name: Sunken Realms
description: Descend into an abandoned underground city to battle orcs, solve puzzles, collect loot, and then return to the surface to upgrade your gear and stats in this modern, old-school dungeon-crawler.

name: Money Run
description: Money Run is a single-player comic book story driven 2D action arcade game that will submerge the player in the atmosphere of vintage noir, dark humour, gangsters and corruption.

name: Rogue Earth
description: Rogue Earth is a unique survival city builder where you prepare for and then face the endless winter. Will you be able to prepare in time? Will you save the spark of human civilization even after the whole planet is ejected out of the Sun's orbit and into the void of space... and at what cost?

name: World of Busking
description: World of Busking is an independently developed, MMO Social Game. Meet other players, interact with AI characters, play music, form bands, attend concerts and try to release your singles to become the #1 songwriter in Music City.

name: Orbisia
description: Orbisia is an open-world survival crafting game. You have to work with your team members to explore and survive the wide and beautiful world. Enjoy a free world by gathering and hunting for survival!

name: Mayu: Last of the Yaksha
description: An exploration-driven adventure RPG set in Ancient India about a young demi-god and his animal sidekicks. Use your jungle detective skills to discover hidden paths, track down mysterious creatures, and find the secret temples of the Old Gods.

name: Octo Vinctum: Saga of the Galactic Stardom War
description: A JRPG/Visual Novel hybrid designed like the legendary RPGs of yesteryear! Vanquish the toughest foes using the power of kind words and musical talent! Uncover the dark and supernatural secrets that lurk beneath a cheery and cutesy world! "Prove the justice of our culture!"

name: Bumaga
description: This walker from 3 persons, the world of which is made of paper. the mechanics here are simple, you can run, jump and create platforms in the indicated places. According to the plot of the game, you need to collect 3 items with which to defeat the enemy in order to return your house and otherplaces.

name: DeepStorm Online
description: Deep-Storm Online the Action and Exploration MMO underwater game! Dive into this world of alien flora & fauna, Explore caves, Beat Bosses, And build your very own class & ship from a huge tech tree featuring over a thousand Nodes & Upgrades!

name: 2 Bit Operative
description: As a government operative tasked with handling the most dangerous tasks, you must Shoot, Spy, Sneak, Sear and Sabotage your way to success. Each mission has unique objectives. Can you complete them all?

name: Spiriat
description: Fly at high speed! Avoid and escape from the dark to find out. Collect light as much as possible, before you meet with the masters, who will guide you to your destiny.

name: Not Spooky: But Good Enough For Me
description: In this first-person horror-lite game, investigate your way through different locales such as the theatre, forests, and urban areas. Solve puzzles and unravel the story behind what happened at the community theatre.

name: Arsenal Shock
description: Arsenal Shock is a fast-paced singleplayer arena dual-weapon shooter. Use a multitude of weapons to fight off endless waves of enemies and achieve new high scores in 11 diverse mayhem-filled arenas. Also includes two Playground levels with gravity gun functionality.

name: Project Mind
description: RAID other spaceships, EXPAND your fleet and EXPLORE space in order to discover the aldions´ real intention...

name: Unhappy Hour
description: unHappy Hour! is a too accurate life-sim featuring bartender action, lousy work-life balance, and not-so-sarcastic humour. Pour beers, pay your bills, and overcome precariousness in this pixelated drama.

name: Oust
description: Oust blends strategy, rpg, and pvp elements neatly into a beautiful, easy-to-pick-up game. Begin the game as a peasant, customize your profession and fighting style, find equipment and gather support to overthrow the king. As king, manage the kingdom to remain in power as long as you can.

name: Unaware
description: Gather your strength and find information about your whereabouts. Explore the area. Find and assemble all the puzzle pieces. This way you will learn about the dark past.

name: The Beresford family
description: On the night of July 20, 1824, eight-year-old Matilda Beresford was found dead. What happened that night? Was little Matilda's death an accident? Discover the origin of the curse.

name: Elemental Land
description: Elemental Land is a free-to-play MMORPG where you can explore the world however you want, facing monsters and players. Monsters, Spells, Craft, PvE, PvP, Guilds and many more.

name: Diamond Hands Arena
description: DHA is a tactical fantasy gladiator game. Recruit a team, train, buy new weapons for heavy arena fights against other teams. Use all you can to win: gossip about opponents, get quests rewards, use powerful magic and pray not to die! The tournament rules are simple: it's harder and harder each time!

name: Dungeon Dueler
description: Hack and slash game. Visit blacksmith and create your own equipment. Also remeber about herbalist and make some potions. When you are ready conquer creatures from dungeon.

name: Auto Cast
description: Auto Cast combines elements from action rouge-lites, RPGs, and Shoot 'Em Ups into a 2D top-down world. Unlock new spells, level up existing ones, equip unique items, and find special events to maximize your chances of survival while cutting through hordes of enemies and bosses.

name: Sanator: Elmo's Legacy
description: Sanator: Elmo's Legacy is a branching visual novel that follows the adventures of a certain plague doctor. What secrets do the Ailur people hold, and who St. Elmo really was? Venture into the heart of the frozen Taiga and find the answers.

name: Crabs: Chef's Story
description: In this Multiplayer Party Brawler, play as one of 'Chef's' crabs! Launch crab ass with 'Crab-fu' and battle online in a number of crazy game modes designed to push your crabs abilities to the limit.

name: Proto Akane
description: Akane pilots a vehicle that transforms to have different abilities to advance and defeat her enemies.

name: I Am Mouse
description: I Am Mouse is a game in which the player takes the role of a mouse, which must find food for the family. Hide, run, distract and knock down. Do your best to get food for your family!

name: Abomiracers
description: Abomiracers is a multiplayer party action game, where you assemble your character from different body parts made of clay and fight to become the King of the Hill!

name: Guardian Mage VR
description: Feel like a battle mage, able to embody powerful spells and bring them down on opponents from the air! Control the course of the battle with the help of rune magic, summon your troops and erect defensive structures. This world is in your hands!

name: Lionel the Dragon
description: A dark and Moody 2.5d, story-driven action puzzle game based on a child with a worrying view of the world.

name: Pingo's Revenge
description: With logical moves you'll be able to push all the diamonds together and thus master the levels. Make your own way through the different areas and kill the enemies with the help of ice blocks to save your girlfriend.

name: Elegos
description: Want to overthrow the sovereignty or work to stand with them? Decide for yourself in Elegos, an immersive first-person RPG where every action matters. Designed with a flexible play system, forge a path through a world where complex political forces clash in any way you like.

name: Realms of Survival
description: Realms of Survival is a Single Player / Online Multiplayer Action RPG, with a Multi-Class Character System, giving players a great variety of playstyles and customization. Fight against monsters, bosses, or other players in various open-world maps and battle scenarios.

name: Whisper Out of Time
description: Whisper Out of Time is many things: Role playing game with a focus on the Role, life simulator in a unique setting, and a fun journey with a, hopefully, even more unique story.

name: Fever Dream
description: Fever Dream: Escape the nightmare 'Ignatius' has trapped your soul in. Survival is key. You aren't alone in the dream, but only you have the power to escape!

name: Squirrels are going nuts
description: A grid based action blast em up with single player and local multiplayer party mode for 1-4 players.

name: Sirenhead: Southpoint
description: Sirenhead: Southpoint, a Survival Horror game that takes place in the 1980's as you, Freddy Anderson try to go camping with your friends when all of a sudden, things go south. Your friends are no where to be seen, you are all alone. Except there is one creature waiting for you in the woods.

name: Cradlemoor
description: Cradlemoor is an interactive mystery game, which casts you as the detective, inviting you to explore a labyrinth of documents, photos, videos and audio clips via a virtual desktop computer. In Cradlemoor, you are the detective.

name: Star Jet Alpha
description: Star Jet Alpha is a top-down 3D space shooter inspired by classic arcade games. Progress through each stage by blowing up enemy space stations while avoiding or destroying enemy missiles, space mines and asteroids. Unlock Star Jet capabilities by completing stages.
Discover who you really are on an adventure where choices matter and accuracy is paramount.

name: With Good Intentions
description: The Age of Blade and the Age of Gun entwined. The master of the knights and the imperial captain are separated by centuries, but bound by memory. Solve the mysteries of the cursed abbey and its immortal lord. Rejoin the link of time. Find out where the road will take thee with good intentions.

name: Falling to Heaven
description: Falling to Heaven is a rogue-like, action, twin-stick shooter. Players will play as a veteran mercenary who has experienced many battles, guided by a mysterious voice, to fight a way out from the bottom of hell, and learn about the truth of his falling.

name: Underground Lords
description: Purge the underworld from the demons!. Underground Lords are hardcore action rogue-like dungeon crawler with procedurally generated levels. Chose one from the 3 characters, gather equipment, and mow the lords that rules the underground!

name: The Four Elements: Zombies
description: A Single player/ Co-op zombies shooter game, with a twist! There are many types of enemies and you utilize a list of abilities based on the four elements to defeat them. Along with many challenges and puzzles to solve, you progress to explore and discover the Four Elements: Zombies universe.

name: SIM Chef: Restaurant management
description: SIM Chef is a restaurant management simulator. Build and decorate, manage employees, create hundreds of classic dishes and drinks, make decisions and become the number one in the world.

name: Exocide
description: Exocide is a retro FPS with an early 00's aesthetic. Manage two powerful sets of weapon systems with extreme aggression to annihilate the swarm! Keep your maniacal robotic backpack excited using a powerful array of weaponry.

name: Covid 69
description: The Year is 2069, covid is worse than ever. Antimaskers just kidnapped your girl. Now there are hordes of zombies between you and your girlfriend.

name: Horse and Go Seek
description: Get ready to gallop through scenic locations with your majestic horse to find all the hidden animals! Travel through a variety of different landscapes to unlock horses, hair colors, levels, spirits and worlds.

name: Oh, Brave New “Red” World!
description: This is the game in the genre of Vertical Shoot’Em Up. Using only your mouse, you will lead one of the “Stalin` falcons” and take part in the Liberation Campaign of the Red Army in the far distant future.

name: Apollo: A Co-Op Game
description: One astronaut. Up to four mission commanders. Work together to plan your mission and experience the historic highlights of the Apollo space program.

name: Afterlife
description: Afterlife is a challenging side-scrolling adventure game. Filled with tight platformer mechanics and obstacles, you must unravel the mysteries of this strange land by finding clues, solving puzzles, and dying, over and over again.

name: Sir Magical Jelly
description: An action-adventure journey of a small slimy creature that has fast mobility. Focused on monster elimination with metroidvania elements.

name: Being a Penguin
description: Being a Penguin is a short and emotional exploration adventure game about wanting to become someone else. Play as penguin Bree as she finds herself as she completes quests from various animals and explores a beautiful frozen world!

name: Let There Be Light
description: Let There Be Light is a puzzle platformer developed by Jack Edwards. Using the complex nature of light and its many forms, you will navigate your way through the capitalism-based afterlife that awaits all living beings after their demise - with some help from a very stressed employee, of course.

name: Strawberry Samurai
description: Strawberry Samurai is a samurai-themed action platformer with a fruity twist. Slash oranges, blueberries, and more in a world filled with bloody combat, sentient fruit, and an obnoxious amount of fruit puns. Oh, and bathe in the juice of your enemies.

name: Wicked Dolls
description: Wicked Dolls is a 4-player online co-op psychological horror game. Investigate hidden clues to find out how to imprison the possessing spirit of the dolls that lurk in the shadows. With a macabre ritual, eliminate the imminent evil, which is not always what you imagine. Are you prepared?

name: Escape Purgatory
description: Set in a limbo realm, this strategic horror game, charges the player with traversing the world while solving puzzles and challenges. With each discovery, collect items, repent your sins, and be freed from evil. Can you survive the wickedness within?

name: FireSquad
description: FireSquad is a real-time strategy game in which you are controlling a group of 4 firefighters. You will need to manage the fire spread, break through doors and windows, search for survivors and rescue them to safety before the fire becomes unmanageable and the building collapses.

name: Inga Ouhou: Murderous Plaza
description: This is a game about the 12 Star Signs x Blood Thirsty Killers x Communal Life.

name: Floppy Cat Adventures
description: Explore a fun and dangerous open world in this darkly comedic soulslike RPG! Talk your way out of (or into) problems, battle monsters, befriend or betray the villagers, learn magic, collect tools and weapons, oh yeah - and find out how you got turned into a cat!

name: Camae
description: Help Camae get his colors back in this action puzzle adventure game. Fight to earn experience to improve your skills and solve a lots of hidden puzzles to get items that will help you on your adventure

name: The Darkest Star
description: Fight for survival by gathering a fleet of powerful space warships in a turn based rogue-like, Decisions are key as the battle evolves over multiple turns. Use a multitude of weapon systems and ship types to press home the attack with a unique turn based system.

name: Turro 2022
description: Just finish the race and be winner!

name: The Instruments of Faith: Padua's Destiny
description: The Instruments Of Faith Padua's Destiny is an epic apocalyptic 2D pixel Metroidvania fantasy action-adventure video game. Journey through the Universe as Young Padua, one of the 7 Guardian protectors of the Universe, to restore the balance of Good over Evil before it is too late!

name: Glob
description: An online fast-paced multiplayer party experience! Master the stretchy power of Glob to sling around the world and throw objects at your enemies! Compete in many competitive game modes or work with friends to solve puzzles and sling through the world together. Did we mention there are lasers?!

name: L.A.P.D. 2195
description: A modern re-imagining of the classic game "Future Cop L.A.P.D.”, you are a rookie cop in the Advanced Weapons and Tactics Unit of the Los Angeles Police Department in the year 2195.

name: Home VR
description: Home is a thrilling VR stealth game following the story of a little girl trying to escape monsters in her boarding school. Think Alien: Isolation but it's VR, you're a little girl with no weapons and you can hide within walls and objects.

name: Garenburg Penitence: The Riflebird
description: Garenburg Penitence is an action-puzzle arcade game about matching sphere colors and exploring the collapsing psyche that destroyed the world. With over 70 unique level maps, additional game modes, and a level editor, learn the story of a fragile girl and her regretful actions.

name: A Good Truck Driver
description: Do you trust your own driving skills? Here a truck simulator that you can show your skills with various obstacles and parkours!

name: Froggy Quest
description: Help Froggy complete a quest in this colorful platformer adventure! Use your sticky tongue to pull, push, and grapple through many challenging levels while collecting as many flies as you can.

name: Technitive
description: Technitive is a first-person open world tower defense set in 2043, where you advance from primitive tools to machines and modern weapons. A colonization attempt is set on an Earth-like planet after an extinction threat to the current planet. Colonize the planet and save the world!

name: Drones: Defenders Astartes
description: A 2D, top-down shoot'em up with simulation elements, embedded in retro tech from the '80s. Blast your way trough space and enemies. Upgrade your space drones. Endure your mothership's AI cynical attitude and enjoy the most realistic shoot'em up ever!

name: The Night Walkers
description: This third-person game is inspired by the horror classics of the 90's. Intense and terrifying pace, survive the endless night and stay sane. Reveal through dramas and tragedies the hidden truth about the night walkers and figure out what lurks after death.

name: Alan-13 Reformation
description: An isometric puzzle game, that makes you think like a programmer.

name: Hell Punk Awakening
description: Hell Punk Awakening is an unconventional first person brawler where you progress beyond death. Destroy enemies in the most ludicrous fashion possible, and awaken the cosmic gods by wreaking pure chaos.

name: Crupt
description: Slash through swarms of enemies, fight bosses, and talk to wacky characters as you struggle to restore everything one Wave at a time.

name: Lands of Vodria
description: Climb the throne in this tactical game with clever maneuvers in card battles, as well as long-term strategy on the map.

name: Gerel: Against the Corvus Empire
description: A 2D Pixel Art Platformer with Metroidvania elements and a heartfelt story.

name: Destinesia
description: Destinesia is a sci-fi metroidvania which you are looking for a new home for humanity. Parkour your way through most dangerous jungles and explore the ancient dungeons. Upgrade your suit with the remains of your ancestors. Reveal the oldest secrets of Homo Sapiens.

name: Wildfox Surfing Paradise
description: Wildfox Surfing Paradise is a physics-based surfing adventure where you explore a tropical island. By doing stunts for a surfing magazine you are able to earn money and buy new surfboards, which allow for even wilder stunts and open up new areas of the game's open world.

name: Retro Ride
description: Lean back, drift into the golden sunset - and let the rhythm take control.

name: Gravix
description: Gravix is a challenging arcade game that will test your agility and puzzle-solving intuition. You must navigate an avatar that is continuously being affected by gravity that you control. Each level will introduce progressively challenging contraptions and deadly obstacles...

name: Fantasy Battle Islands
description: Let's go on an adventure on our little island. We capture enemy islands and increase our island. We place different types of troops on the island and fight with a stronger enemy.

name: The Mansions of Shadows
description: First person game. Or you play Erwan, a young journalist. You are investigating a missing person.

name: Himbo Harem Homicide
description: A classic whodunit—but with a harem of himbos! Determine which of your hunky housemates is killing off the other handsome hardbodies before you’re left with not a handful of hotties, but just one murderous, monogamous man.

name: All Hail Temos
description: A first-person action RPG in a small hand-crafted open world. You are not a chosen one, but choose your own fate. Explore, fight, loot, trade, talk, quest, ride creatures, cast spells, or sneak and steal. Your actions can grow your starting village into a kingdom or bring it to ruin.

name: Starchild Velta and loadtosky
description: Let's go on a journey of training! 2D side-scrolling action adventure of a cute star child!

name: Tactics Adrift
description: A competitive turn-based tactics game with simultaneous planning.

name: Tatari
description: Take the role of a detective from Tokyo who tries to solve the mysterious case of the disappearance of a young camper. You will try to follow the trail of evidence to guide you through an enigmatic and paranormal case connected with a Japanese urban legend. Can you help until the end?

name: Twilight's Final Judgement
description: Twilight's Final Judgement is a noir turn-based RPG. Players will explore a 1940s New York where the secret elites of the world are the Greek Gods. You will level up and build upon 4 playable characters. Players will also talk with NPCs learn secret lore and form bonds.

name: This is Torture Together
description: This is Torture Together is an online co-op horror game for 1-4 players, following a structured campaign with randomized elements. Abducted by a sinister kidnapper, you now must escape his deranged facility, survive twisted abominations, solve puzzles, and reach one of several endings.

name: Constructopia
description: Constructopia is a survival tower-defense game where you can design, build and craft your towers! Gather resources by hand or build systems aimed at automating your production! Build and maintain bases, design defense contraptions and use them to aid you in your adventure against the trolls!

name: Lone Planet
description: A sci-fi adventure with RPG with puzzle platform elements

name: Terror: Endless Night
description: Terror: Endless Night is a turn-based strategy game set in the XIX century. The game takes you aboard a rescue ship in search of HMS “Terror” and HMS “Erebus”, Royal Navy vessels on a mission to sail under the North Pole and reach East Asia. You were chosen to lead that expedition but let your son take your place and make a name for himself. Now he’s missing and you find yourself trapped in the middle of the Arctic Ocean, rid with immeasurable guilt.

name: Costume Clash
description: Costume Clash is a Halloween themed kart based action-adventure game set in a expansive world environment and played from a third-person perspective. The player takes on the role of a Hallowmon.

name: Lost in the Space
description: Lost In The Space combines frantic top-down action with fast, fluid and very addictive gameplay, with instant response to player commands

name: Torden
description: A stylized 3rd person action fantasy game. Slash your way with many but simple attack mechanics. Select from dozens of spells to help in your battle. Featuring a wide array of enemies with different quirks that need your quick reflexes and patience to deal with.

name: Clueless Fashion
description: Clueless Fashion is an unreleased video game made for the Nintendo DS, intended to be a tie-in for the 1995 comedy film Clueless. The game was developed by Glyphic Entertainment and was set to be published by 505 Games. The game was possibly intended to be released in Europe on February 26th, 2010, with no other planned releases being known (though the game is rated by the ESRB, meaning that a North American release was also likely intended).

name: Squirrels: Doomed City
description: Squirrels: doomed city is an exciting RPG set in the city of N, the main inhabitants of which are squirrels.. Explore the open world, go through the plot and unravel what secrets the doomed city holds

name: Box Knight
description: A funny, silly and irreverent action RPG roguelike. A mix of ‘the Office’ and ‘Lord of the Rings’ with a comic like aesthetic.

name: Labyrinth
description: Labyrinth is an intense close ranged hack n slash focused on steel vs steel action in deep and deadly battles against nightmarish demons within a mysterious labyrinth that promises to lead triumphant warriors off their dying world.

name: Nodyssey
description: A Dungeon Crawler RPG where you stay in your bedroom to defeat the Evil! Explore procedural generated dungeons, gain new abilities, build relationships and solve mysteries to overcome the dream realm! Enjoy your quiet life in town during the day, but prepare to face terrible Nightmares at night...

name: Horror haze
description: Explore the world, learn magic spells, defeat enemies and solve tricky puzzles. All this awaits you in "Horror haze".

name: Plunge the Plumber
description: Is that a Plunger or a Robot? No! it's Plungster!!!!! The Hero we never knew we needed. He is the only one to save this impossible project and make the Community start to feel like Home. Who knew Plumbers were heroes?!

name: Vulnerable
description: Embody a displaced therapist in a futuristic refugee camp. Discover the life in the camp and share your everyday life alongside people with heavy pasts. Use logic and your therapeutic skills to solve mysteries threatening both your survival and the camp.

name: Raconteur
description: Raconteur is a first-person exploration game. Alfred Poe is a imaginative writer that he uses his imagination to create virtual worlds to write his stories with his faithful friend, Daimon. Two friends didn't see each other for a long time, and Daimon is anger at him.

name: Silverblood
description: Years after leaving her family to join the Sisters of the Whiterock Coven, Edith is anxious to finally return home. But first she has to pass her Trial of Ascension, a harrowing task bestowed by her patron deity. Together, Edith and her bully must complete the trial, no matter the consequences.

name: The Perished
description: A first person horror game where the player must use stealth and wits to escape the evil that faces them. This tense and story driven experience will leave the player terrified, but excited to explore the mysteries that surround them.

name: Datascape
description: Traverse the Datascape, hack ICE to explore their programs and make a run on the SimulaCom corp! If that's not your thing just explore a section of the Datascape. A compact experience with a message to discover.

name: Operation Lovecraft: Fallen Doll
description: A roguelike strategy game featuring squad tactics and deck building, paired with a real-time sexually explicit third person sandbox supporting up to 10 players on the same map. Command glamorous investigators as they battle (and bed) cultists & eldritch horrors from Cthulhu mythos.

name: Time's Crest

name: Linia super
description:
Linia is back and does it in style with revamped visuals and more than 100 levels packed with original and unpredictable puzzles.

In "Linia super" - the second edition of the game downloaded by over 1 million users worldwide - you will once again go hunting for color sequences, drawing a line to create the correct connection between the different shapes on the screen.

But this time, to make it even more engaging, you will also have to keep an eye on your ink supply while you draw lines and collect the "Liniacoins" that will help you through the exciting chapters of the game.

It's easy to get carried away by this mesmerizing dance of colors that pulse, spin, hide and twirl, going to great lengths to avoid being caught by your line.

It will take skill, a keen eye and a sense of rhythm to get the sequence right. Are you up for the challenge?
